subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Lisa Leslie scored 26 points and Sylvia Fowles added 20 points and 16 rebounds to help the United States beat China, 86-61, in Beijing in an Olympic warm-up tournament. The United States (4-1) finished the preliminary round of the Good Luck Beijing Tournament tied with China (4-1) for the top record. The teams will meet in the gold-medal game Saturday night.
